p: The genus Ferula L. belongs to the Apiacae family dycotiledonus plants comprising more than 400 genera and about 3700 species. This genus consists of about 170 species which mainly grow in the Mediterraneus zones, Northern Africa and Central Asia [ 24]. In Italy, three species have been described i.e., Ferula communis L., Ferula glauca L. and Ferula arrigonii Bocchieri.
